_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: VC:MP
author: mrsk1431298@gmail.com
description: Vice City Mutlplayer is modification of Grand Theft Auto Vice City Released in 2003. The following Vice City Multiplayer mod allow you to join from any territory around the world.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl unzip lib32gcc1 ca-certificates
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o server.zip https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MRSK143/vc-mp-egg/master/server.zip
mkdir -p /mnt/server
unzip -o -d /mnt/server/ server.zip
cd /mnt/server
chmod -R 744 /mnt/server
export HOME=/mnt/server
